features: NOURISH YOUR SKIN: Enjoy velvety smooth, richly moisturized skin with the Hempz Herbal Body Moisturizer. With a light, tropical scent you’ll love, this moisturizing body lotion helps repair and condition skin so it is healthy and nourished.

ENRICHED LOTIONS: Our body lotion for women with dry skin is enriched with 100% natural, pure Hemp Seed Oil, which delivers amazing omega fatty acids, antioxidants, and skin-smoothing amino acids to help protect skin and lock in moisture.

EXCLUSIVE FORMULA: This creamy, smoothing body moisturizer lotion features Sugarcane and Papaya extracts to moisturize, condition and rejuvenate skin with Vitamins A, B, and C. Shea Butter provides Vitamin E to protect against free radicals.

PERFECT EVERYDAY LOTION: Our body lotions for women are ideal for normal and dry skin, and you will enjoy a tropical vacation in your own home with the light, sweet scent of Sugarcane and Papaya. It can be used every day for healthy, nourished skin.

SAFE FOR SKIN: At Hempz, we know how important it is to only use the finest products. Our body lotion moisturizer is made in the USA, 100% vegan, and it is dye-free, paraben-free, gluten-free, and THC-free, so you know it will be gentle on skin.
body.description: Experience incredibly smooth, ultra-hydrated skin with the Hempz Herbal Body Moisturizer! This amazing dry skin lotion for women’s body is formulated with 100% pure, natural Hemp Seed Oil, which provides antioxidants, amino acids, and omega fatty acids to help protect skin and lock in moisture. It features the sweet, light scent of Sugarcane and Papaya so that you can enjoy a tropical vacation from the comfort of your own home! With a unique formula designed to repair and condition skin, this skin moisturizer for women’s body features Sugarcane and Papaya extracts, which help moisturize and rejuvenate skin with Vitamins A, B, and C, while also providing carotenoids. Shea Butter offers Vitamin E, a natural emollient that helps ward off free radical damage - keeping your skin healthy and fortifying its natural barrier! With a creamy, moisture-rich formula, these body lotions for dry skin are a perfect daily moisturizer to keep your skin radiant and velvety smooth. At Hempz, we are dedicated to providing high-quality, exceptional skincare products that we are sure you’ll love! Our moisturizing body lotion for dry skin is vegan and made in the USA, and it contains absolutely no parabens, gluten, THC, or dyes, so you can be certain it's safe and gentle. Hydrate and refresh your skin from head to toe with this luxurious vegan lotion for women - carefully designed to always keep your skin looking healthy and rejuvenated! Product Details: Fresh Fusions Sugarcane & Papaya Herbal Body Moisturizer - Size: 17 fl. oz. - Scent: Sugarcane & Papaya - Also available in 2.25 fl. oz.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sugarcane Papaya scent
reviews.reviewText: Love the scent. It is not to strong and the lotion really moisturizes well and it doesn’t leave your skin greasy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moisturizing And Ideal For My Skin
reviews.reviewText: Reviews for a product such as this are always going to be subjective. What works well for one person’s skin might be hell on someone else’s.For me, this product is a must buy. The lotion moisturizes and provides a barrier against dryness that will last all day unless I’m washing my hands frequently with harsh soap. I primarily use this for my hands and feet, as I have an incredible sensitivity to dry fingertips that renders me incapable of using my hands until the problem is rectified. I have also used it on the rest of my body and have experienced positive results there as well. It softens skin ant that softness lasts.Now, there is something that some people might not appreciate. If you’re sensitive to strong or concentrated scents, you may not like this lotion. The scent is a nice one, but it can be very powerful. I don’t mind this, but it’s something to consider. The scent isn’t, in my opinion, chemical, but quite sweet. If you’re not a fan of powerful scents or they give you a headache, either test this first somehow, use it sparingly or turn your attention to a product with a less concntrated fragrance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very calming scent.
reviews.reviewText: I keep buying this for my wife because she says it’s good and she likes the scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A M A Z I N G
reviews.reviewText: This lotion is amazing. The fragrance is not overbearing it's perfect and balanced leaving my hands so soft. It's a staple in all of our bathrooms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This scent is absolutely amazing!! I purchased this about 8 times already! Lmao! They need to make bigger bottles. I always get compliments when I put it on. It's very sweet smelling! I love it! Con: it stops pumping once it gets to a certain level in the bottle...Then u have to turn it upside down to get it all out! Bottle improvement is definitely needed... Otherwise, its moisturizing w/ an amazing scent!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great lotion and fantastic scent
reviews.reviewText: I use Hempz lotion on a daily basis, and I absolutely love it.The lotion is smooth and very moisturizing, and leaves my skin feeling refreshed and soft to the touch.Hempz offers a wide variety of scents, but the Sugarcane/Papaya is my favorite. It's sweet, but in a subtle way without being overpowering.If you live in a dry environment, I can't recommend this lotion highly enough.

reviews.reviewText: Love this product, makes your skin so soft snd smells fabulous
Excelente producto. Llegó antes de tiempo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 19, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Love the smell although it doesn’t necessarily last but I guess that’s not what a body moisturiser is for. Anyhow the pump is great and dispenses the most generous amount just enough for each body section. The moisturiser glides on easily and absorbs so nicely and my skin stays smooth until i shower the next day and re apply. 10/10 would recommend.

I love almost all of the Hempz lotions that I've tried. This one smells very yummy and mild. I really love the citrus scented lotion. Hempz lotions leave my skin nice and soft. I wish their body washes had more scent than they do because they are very pricey and a scent let down for me. Love HEMPZ ❤️
Me gustan mucho los productos tengo mucho tiempo de úsalos
